subject: Football
Domestic Violence
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: After a grand jury indicted him on charges of assaulting his fiancée, Ray Rice received a two-game suspension, half of the N.F.L.'s minimum punishment for steroid use.
snippet: After a grand jury indicted him on charges of assaulting his fiancée, Ray Rice received a two-game suspension, half of the N.F.L.'s minimum punishment for steroid use.
